View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.hana;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   import org.hibernate.cfg.JdbcSettings;
5   import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
6   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
7   import spring.SpringApp;
8   
9   public abstract class ConcreteHanaSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
10  
11      public ConcreteHanaSuiteIT() {
12          this.jdbcURL = SpringApp.propsHana.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_URL);
13          this.jdbcUser = SpringApp.propsHana.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_USER);
14          this.jdbcPass = SpringApp.propsHana.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_PASSWORD);
15  
16          this.databaseToInject = "SYS";
17          this.tableToInject = "USERS";
18          this.columnToInject = "USER_NAME";
19          
20          this.queryAssertDatabases = "select schema_name from sys.schemas";
21          this.queryAssertTables = String.format(
22              """
23              select distinct name
24              from sys.rs_tables_ t
25              where t.schema = '%s'
26              union
27              select distinct name
28              from sys.rs_views_ v
29              where v.schema = '%s'
30              """,
31              this.databaseToInject,
32              this.databaseToInject
33          );
34          this.queryAssertColumns = String.format(
35              """
36              select distinct c.name r
37              from sys.rs_columns_ c
38              inner join sys.rs_tables_ t on c.cid = t.oid
39              where t.schema = '%s' and t.name = '%s'
40              union
41              select distinct c1.name r
42              from sys.rs_columns_ c1
43              inner join sys.rs_views_ v on c1.cid = v.oid
44              where v.schema = '%s' and v.name = '%s'
45              """,
46              this.databaseToInject, this.tableToInject,
47              this.databaseToInject, this.tableToInject
48          );
49          this.queryAssertValues = String.format("select distinct %s from %s.%s", this.columnToInject, this.databaseToInject, this.tableToInject);
50      }
51  
52      @AfterEach
53      public void checkVendor() {
54          Assertions.assertEquals(
55              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getHana(),
56              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
57          );
58      }
59  }
